com.meltmedia.cadmium.email
Interface MessageTransformer

All Known Implementing Classes:
IdentityMessageTransformer, TestingMessageTransformer
public interface MessageTransformer

Instances of this interface are used to transform messages just before they are passed to the JavaMail API.

Method Summary
 javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage transform(javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message)
          Transforms a message.
 

Method Detail

transform

javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage transform(javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message)
                                          throws javax.mail.MessagingException
Transforms a message. The message itself may be changed by this method, or a new message object may be created.

Throws:
javax.mail.MessagingException
